item.description:
As part of the "First Thursday" activities, the Wadsworth Atheneum shows a movie that ties to the theme of the event. In February they are showing "The Sound of Music" in popular sing-along style. If you've always secretly sung along with "My Favorite Things" or "So Long, Farewell" - now you can sing along with everybody!

Admission to the movies is included in your admission to "First Thursday." I try to come to each film but sometimes work late, so don't let that stop you. Other meetup groups also attend and you might join one of them if you don't find other movie meetup people. This event should be popular, "Sound of Music" singalongs in other places tend to sell out. No word whether people will be coming in costume, wait for additional information about the First Thursday event to know whether you should, or may.

Movie lasts 174 minutes, officially.
item.name: "Sound of Music" sing-along @ First Thursday
